name: Mayan Dive
description:
This is my submission to the 48th Ludum Dare, and was made under the Compo ruleset. The Jam's theme was "Deeper and deeper", so I have made a short Metroidvania where you explore a submerged Mayan ruin.

This is my first Ludum Dare submission ever, and I look forward to competing in LD49 when the time comes!

Any feedback as always is encouraged and appreciated!

Enjoy playing!

Controls: WASDMoveSpaceJumpMouse1ShootCConjure Shield Links:

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/BanresCoding
